topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
So

I had a dream

Like a fucking _scary dream_

about God being a monster and and terrorizing this school occasionally

and like

this one kid, the main character

found him inside the school, he used to look like a grey magenta and green caterpie with kakuna's head

but then somehow it grew into some kind of abomination and started floating up and attacking the school kids

a couple people managed to escape, so the main character tried to get some answers out of people; what happened to his "new pet" or whatever

what he got wasn't any good so he just decided to run for home

he ended up hitting his head on this new sign that was put up, "CONGRATION!"

so his brother didn't witness what happened at the main character's school cause he went to a different one or whatever, so he said something like "Fuckin scaredy-cat! I heard you back there! 'mommy, mommy,' that shit was priceless!"

blah blah he went home blah blah sister blah went to bed

so he had this like, POWERFUL DREAM

the part where he ran into the "CONGRATION!"sign repeated, but the colors were fucked up or something

So "God" comes flying around the corner, the air is wooshing

God eventually says "RUN" like five times in a row, getting angrier with every mention of the word

And when God got like super close, he remembers his brother came, so God was basically wiped from that dream

So the protagonist wakes up, fuckin panting and wide-eyed

and somewhere within the school, god was apparently monitoring his dream, so he eventually set a new goal, to get rid of the protagonist's brother

-then I woke up-
topics.author: 511c09ec7f123b35980001eb

[bq="Miyo"]So

I had a dream

Like a fucking _scary dream_

about God being a monster and and terrorizing this school occasionally

and like

this one kid, the main character

found him inside the school, he used to look like a grey magenta and green caterpie with kakuna's head

but then somehow it grew into some kind of abomination and started floating up and attacking the school kids

a couple people managed to escape, so the main character tried to get some answers out of people; what happened to his "new pet" or whatever

what he got wasn't any good so he just decided to run for home

he ended up hitting his head on this new sign that was put up, "CONGRATION!"

so his brother didn't witness what happened at the main character's school cause he went to a different one or whatever, so he said something like "Fuckin scaredy-cat! I heard you back there! 'mommy, mommy,' that shit was priceless!"

blah blah he went home blah blah sister blah went to bed

so he had this like, POWERFUL DREAM

the part where he ran into the "CONGRATION!"sign repeated, but the colors were fucked up or something

So "God" comes flying around the corner, the air is wooshing

God eventually says "RUN" like five times in a row, getting angrier with every mention of the word

And when God got like super close, he remembers his brother came, so God was basically wiped from that dream

So the protagonist wakes up, fuckin panting and wide-eyed

and somewhere within the school, god was apparently monitoring his dream, so he eventually set a new goal, to get rid of the protagonist's brother
